body: @Scathach I don't think so, i admit the artstyle's a lot similar to manga but i guess her eyes a bit different than the original.

this doujin HAS to be from the manga author... the art is almost on the exact level of detail & direction.
Akebi looks to ME almost exactly as she does in the manga.
